00037 CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan()

00039 
00040         m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined = false;

00043 /**
00044  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00045  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00046  * @return SelfDoc
00047  */
00048 SelfDoc CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::explainSelf()
00049 {
00050     CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan obj;
00051     SelfDoc doc;
00052     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00053     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00054     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00055     return doc;
00056 }

00058 /**
00059  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00060  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00061  */
00062 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::getDefaultDocOptions()
00063 {
00064   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00065 
00066   // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00067 
00068   SelfDoc::Opt lohCS_errorrate = {"lohCS_errorrate", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.05", "0.05", "NA", "NA", "LOH CS Error Rate"};
00069   opts.push_back(lohCS_errorrate);
00070 
00071   SelfDoc::Opt lohCS_beta = {"lohCS_beta", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.001", "0.001", "NA", "NA", "LOH CS Beta"};
00072   opts.push_back(lohCS_beta);
00073 
00074   SelfDoc::Opt lohCS_alpha = {"lohCS_alpha", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.01", "0.01", "NA", "NA", "LOH CS Alpha"};
00075   opts.push_back(lohCS_alpha);
00076 
00077   SelfDoc::Opt lohCS_separation = {"lohCS_separation", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "1000000", "1000000", "NA", "NA", "LOH CS Separation"};
00078   opts.push_back(lohCS_separation);
00079 
00080   SelfDoc::Opt lohCS_nMinMarkers = {"lohCS_nMinMarkers", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "10", "10", "NA", "NA", "LOH CS Minimum Marker Count"};
00081   opts.push_back(lohCS_nMinMarkers);
00082 
00083   SelfDoc::Opt lohCS_NoCallThreshold = {"lohCS_NoCallThreshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.05", "0.05", "NA", "NA", "LOH CS No Call Threshold"};
00084   opts.push_back(lohCS_NoCallThreshold);
00085 
00086   SelfDoc::Opt lohCS_MinGenomicSpan = {"lohCS_minGenomicSpan", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "1000000", "1000000", "NA", "NA", "LOH CS Minimum Genomic Span"};
00087   opts.push_back(lohCS_MinGenomicSpan);
00088 
00089   return opts;
00090 }

00092 /**
00093  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00094  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00095  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00096  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00097  *
00098  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00099  *
00100  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00101  */
00102 SelfCreate* CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00103 {
00104     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00105     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00106     CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan();
00107     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00108 
00109     pMethod->m_dLohCNErrorRate = setupDoubleParameter("lohCS_errorrate", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00110     pMethod->m_dLohCNBeta = setupDoubleParameter("lohCS_beta", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00111     pMethod->m_dLohCNAlpha = setupDoubleParameter("lohCS_alpha", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00112     pMethod->m_iLohCNSeparation = setupIntParameter("lohCS_separation", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00113     pMethod->m_iLohCNMinimumMarkerCount = setupIntParameter("lohCS_nMinMarkers", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00114     pMethod->m_dLohCNNoCallThreshold = setupDoubleParameter("lohCS_NoCallThreshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00115     pMethod->m_iLohCNMinGenomicSpan = setupIntParameter("lohCS_minGenomicSpan", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00116 
00117     return pMethod;
00118 }

00120 /**
00121  * @brief run the analysis
00122  */
00123 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::run()
00124 {
00125     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::run(...) start");
00126     isSetup();
00127 
00128     getEngine()->setOpt("minSegSeparation", ::getInt(m_iLohCNSeparation));
00129 
00130     determineLocalProbeSets();
00131 
00132     std::vector<char> vHomHet(getProbeSets()->size());
00133     int iMarkerCount = 0;
00134     int iHetCutoff = 0;
00135     if (!lohPreProcessing(vHomHet, iMarkerCount, iHetCutoff)) {throw(Except("LohPreProcessing failed."));}
00136     int iLastChromosome = getProbeSets()->at(getProbeSets()->size() - 1)->getChromosome();
00137 //    Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOH::run(...) ", iLastChromosome, 1, iLastChromosome);
00138     for (int iChromosome = 1; (iChromosome <= iLastChromosome); iChromosome++)
00139     {
00140         try
00141         {
00142 //        Verbose::progressStep(1);
00143         int iChromosomeProbeSetCount = 0;
00144         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00145         {
00146             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00147             if ((vHomHet[iIndex] >= 0) && (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iChromosome))
00148             {
00149                 iChromosomeProbeSetCount++;
00150             }
00151         }
00152         std::vector<char> vChromosomeGenotypeCalls(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00153         std::vector<int> vChromosomePositions(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00154         std::vector<int> vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes(iChromosomeProbeSetCount);
00155         int iProbeSetIndex = 0;
00156         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00157         {
00158             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00159             if ((vHomHet[iIndex] >= 0) && (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() == iChromosome))
00160             {
00161                 vChromosomeGenotypeCalls[iProbeSetIndex] = vHomHet[iIndex];
00162                 vChromosomePositions[iProbeSetIndex] = pobjProbeSet->getPosition();
00163                 vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iProbeSetIndex] = iIndex;
00164                 iProbeSetIndex++;
00165             }
00166         }
00167         int iStartIndex = 0;
00168         for (int iIndex = 1; (iIndex <= iChromosomeProbeSetCount); iIndex++)
00169         {
00170             if ((iIndex == iChromosomeProbeSetCount) || ((getProbeSets()->at(vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iIndex])->getPosition() - getProbeSets()->at(vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iIndex - 1])->getPosition()) > m_iLohCNSeparation))
00171             {
00172                 int iSegmentProbeSetCount = ((iIndex - 1) - iStartIndex + 1);
00173                 if (iSegmentProbeSetCount >= iMarkerCount)
00174                 {
00175                     std::vector<char> vSegmentGenotypeCalls(iSegmentProbeSetCount);
00176                     std::vector<int> vSegmentPositions(iSegmentProbeSetCount);
00177                     std::vector<char> vLoh(iSegmentProbeSetCount);
00178                     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < iSegmentProbeSetCount); iSegmentIndex++)
00179                     {
00180                         vSegmentGenotypeCalls[iSegmentIndex] = vChromosomeGenotypeCalls[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex];
00181                         vSegmentPositions[iSegmentIndex] = vChromosomePositions[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex];
00182                     }
00183                     lohFind(vSegmentGenotypeCalls, vSegmentPositions, iMarkerCount, iHetCutoff, m_iLohCNMinGenomicSpan, vLoh);
00184                     for (int iSegmentIndex = 0; (iSegmentIndex < iSegmentProbeSetCount); iSegmentIndex++)
00185                     {
00186                         getProbeSets()->at(vChromosomeProbeSetIndexes[iStartIndex + iSegmentIndex])->setLoh(vLoh[iSegmentIndex]);
00187                     }
00188                 }
00189                 iStartIndex = iIndex;
00190             }
00191         }
00192         }
00193         catch(...) {Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::run(...) Working on Chromosome " + ::getInt(iChromosome)); throw;}
00194     }
00195     imputeMissingLOHCalls();
00196    //    Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00197     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::run(...) end");
00198 }
00199    
00200 
00201 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::imputeMissingLOHCalls()
00202 {        
00203         std::vector<CNProbeSet*> vLOHProbeSets; 
00204         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00205         {
00206                 CNProbeSet* pProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex); 
00207                 if( pProbeSet->processAsSNP() )
00208                 {
00209                         vLOHProbeSets.push_back(pProbeSet);   
00210                 } 
00211         }
00212 
00213         // This is code to dump out the loh status before the impute algorithm is invoked.
00214         bool testFlag = false;
00215         if(testFlag)
00216         {
00217                 affx::TsvFile *tsv = new affx::TsvFile;
00218                 tsv->writeTsv(getExperiment()->getExperimentName() + ".LohProbes.txt");
00219                 tsv->defineColumn(    0,0,"position", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00220                 tsv->defineColumn(    0,1,"lohState", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00221                 tsv->defineColumn(    0,2,"Chromosome", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00222                 tsv->defineColumn(    0,3,"Genotype", affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE);
00223 
00224             for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vLOHProbeSets.size(); iIndex++)
00225             {
00226                 CNProbeSet* pProbeSet = vLOHProbeSets[iIndex];
00227                 tsv->set(0,0,pProbeSet->getPosition());
00228                 tsv->set(0,1,pProbeSet->getLoh());
00229                 tsv->set(0,2,pProbeSet->getChromosome());
00230                 tsv->set(0,3,pProbeSet->getGenotypeCall());
00231                 tsv->writeLevel(0);
00232             }
00233             delete tsv;
00234         }
00235 
00236 
00237         int iLeftIndex=0;
00238         int iRightIndex=1;
00239                 
00240 
00241         int iLeftLohStatus=0;  
00242         int iRightLohStatus=0;  
00243         CNProbeSet* pLeftProbeSet = NULL;      
00244         CNProbeSet* pRightProbeSet =  NULL;     
00245 
00246         while(iRightIndex < vLOHProbeSets.size())
00247         {
00248 
00249 
00250                 pLeftProbeSet = vLOHProbeSets[iLeftIndex];      
00251                 pRightProbeSet =  vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex];     
00252 
00253                 iLeftLohStatus=pLeftProbeSet->getLoh();  
00254                 iRightLohStatus=pRightProbeSet->getLoh();  
00255 
00256                 if(!pLeftProbeSet->lohCalled())
00257                 {
00258                         if(!pRightProbeSet->lohCalled() ) 
00259                         {
00260                                 // If we don't get an loh call on the right we advance.
00261                                 iRightIndex++;
00262                                 // If we have advanced beyond the collection of probesets we clean up since we never get back in the loop. 
00263                                 if(iRightIndex == vLOHProbeSets.size())
00264                                 {
00265                                         for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex; iIndex < iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00266                                         {
00267                                                 vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(0);         
00268                                         }
00269                                 }
00270                                 continue;
00271                         } 
00272                         else
00273                         {
00274                         //  At this point we have just finished advancing the right pointer and thus 3 things can happen.  
00275                         //  RightIndex passes out of the chromosome or over the centromere.
00276                         //  Or hits a marker with valid loh call.
00277                         //  Note that we put the 3rd case last since we can get a valid loh call across a boundary but want to 
00278                         //  deal with it as in the first two cases.
00279                         //  Note that the right pointer cannot point outside the array since that is the condition on the while loop.
00280                                 if( (vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex]->getPosition() - vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex-1]->getPosition()) > m_iLohCNSeparation)
00281                                 {
00282                                         for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex; iIndex < iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00283                                         {
00284                                                 vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(0);
00285                                         }
00286                                         // Note that iRightIndex points across a boundary so we do not set it's loh. ie. < not <= in above for loop. 
00287                                         iLeftIndex=iRightIndex;
00288                                         iRightIndex=iLeftIndex+1;
00289                                         // Note that here we can be pointing beyond the array bounds, but even though we never
00290                                         // get back in the loop we have cleaned up. i.e. set the last set of markers to have non-loh.
00291                                         continue;                             
00292                                 }
00293                                 if( vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex]->getChromosome() != vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex-1]->getChromosome() )
00294                                 {
00295                                         for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex; iIndex < iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00296                                         {
00297                                                 vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(0);
00298                                         }
00299                                         iLeftIndex=iRightIndex;
00300                                         iRightIndex=iLeftIndex+1;
00301                                         continue;                             
00302                                 }
00303                                 // We now have an loh call on the right but none on the left.
00304                                 {
00305                                         for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex; iIndex <= iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00306                                         {
00307                                                 vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(iRightLohStatus);
00308                                         }
00309                                         // We now move the left and right indices.  Note that how they move depends on whether or not we
00310                                         // are within a chromsome or if the right index is at the end of a chromsome.  In the first case
00311                                         // we advance the left to the right index since we need this points loh status to continue. In the
00312                                         // second case we advance both left and right to the first two positions in the next chromsome.
00313                                         if(iRightIndex+1 == vLOHProbeSets.size()) 
00314                                         {
00315                                                 iRightIndex++;
00316                                                 continue;
00317                                         }
00318                                         if
00319                                         (    
00320                                              ( vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex+1]->getChromosome() != vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex]->getChromosome() ) 
00321                                                  ||   
00322                                              ( (vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex+1]->getPosition()- vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex]->getPosition()) > m_iLohCNSeparation )  
00323                                         )
00324                                         {     
00325                                                 iLeftIndex=iRightIndex+1;
00326                                                 iRightIndex=iLeftIndex+1;
00327                                         }
00328                                         else
00329                                         { 
00330                                                 iLeftIndex=iRightIndex;
00331                                                 iRightIndex=iLeftIndex+1;
00332                                         }
00333                                         continue;                         
00334                                 }
00335 
00336                         }   
00337                 }
00338                 else
00339                 {
00340                         if(!pRightProbeSet->lohCalled() )
00341                         {
00342                                 iRightIndex++;
00343                                 if(iRightIndex == vLOHProbeSets.size())                                                  
00344                                 {
00345                                         for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex; iIndex < iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00346                                         {
00347                                                 vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(iLeftLohStatus);
00348                                         }  
00349                                         continue;                
00350                                 }
00351                         }
00352                         else
00353                         {
00354                          // Again, at this point 3 things can happen.   
00355                          // RightIndex passes out of the chromosome or over the centromere.
00356                          // Or hits a marker with valid loh call.
00357                          // Note that we put the 3rd case last since we can get a valid loh call across a boundary but want to 
00358                          // deal with it as in the first two cases.
00359                               
00360                                if( (vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex]->getPosition() - vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex-1]->getPosition()) > m_iLohCNSeparation)
00361                                 {
00362                                         for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex; iIndex < iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00363                                         {
00364                                                 vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(iLeftLohStatus);
00365                                         }
00366                                          
00367                                         iLeftIndex=iRightIndex;
00368                                         iRightIndex=iLeftIndex+1;
00369                                         // Note that here we can be pointing beyond the array bounds, but even though we never
00370                                         // get back in the loop we have cleaned up. i.e. set the last set of markers to have non-loh.
00371                                         continue;
00372                                 }
00373                                 if( vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex]->getChromosome() != vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex-1]->getChromosome() )
00374                                 {
00375                                         for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex; iIndex < iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00376                                         {
00377                                                 vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(iLeftLohStatus);
00378                                         }
00379                                         iLeftIndex=iRightIndex;
00380                                         iRightIndex=iLeftIndex+1;
00381                                         continue;
00382                                 }
00383                                 // We now have an loh call on the left and the right.
00384                                 {
00385                                         // At this point we have 2 cases.  The left and right probesets have the same loh state 
00386                                         // Or one has loh the other non-loh.
00387                                         if(iRightLohStatus==iLeftLohStatus)
00388                                         {
00389                                                 for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex; iIndex <= iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00390                                                 {
00391                                                         vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(iLeftLohStatus);
00392                                                 }
00393                                         }
00394                                         else
00395                                         {
00396                                                 if(iRightLohStatus==0)
00397                                                 {
00398                                                         for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex+1; iIndex <= iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00399                                                         {
00400                                                                 vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(0);
00401                                                         }
00402                                                 }
00403                                                 else
00404                                                 {
00405                                                         for(int iIndex = iLeftIndex; iIndex < iRightIndex; iIndex++)
00406                                                         {
00407                                                                 vLOHProbeSets[iIndex]->setLoh(0);
00408                                                         }
00409                                                 }
00410                                         }
00411                                         if(iRightIndex+1 == vLOHProbeSets.size())
00412                                         {
00413                                                 iRightIndex++;
00414                                                 continue;
00415                                         }
00416                                        if
00417                                         (
00418                                              ( vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex+1]->getChromosome() != vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex]->getChromosome() )
00419                                                  ||
00420                                              ( (vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex+1]->getPosition()- vLOHProbeSets[iRightIndex]->getPosition()) > m_iLohCNSeparation )
00421                                         )
00422                                         { 
00423                                                 iLeftIndex=iRightIndex+1;
00424                                                 iRightIndex=iLeftIndex+1;
00425                                         }
00426                                         else
00427                                         { 
00428                                                 iLeftIndex=iRightIndex;
00429                                                 iRightIndex=iLeftIndex+1;
00430                                         }
00431                                         continue;
00432                                 }
00433                         }
00434                }
00435         }
00436 }

00439 
00440 /**
00441  * @brief Preprocess the genotype calls to get the marker count cutoff and the het call cutoff
00442  * @param std::vector<char>& - The vector of hom and/or het calls
00443  * @param int& - The marker count cutoff to calculate
00444  * @param int& - The het call cutoff to calculate
00445  * @return bool - Was the function successful or not (true = successful)
00446  */
00447 bool CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::lohPreProcessing(std::vector<char>& vHomHet, int& iMarkerCount, int& iHetCutoff)
00448 {
00449     int iHetCount = 0;
00450     int iCallCount = 0;
00451     int iNoCallCount = 0;
00452     double dMaximumGenotypeConfidence = 0;
00453     int iSnpCount = 0;
00454     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)getProbeSets()->size()); iIndex++)
00455     {
00456         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->at(iIndex);
00457         pobjProbeSet->setLoh(numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN());
00458         if (pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP()) {iSnpCount++;}
00459         vHomHet[iIndex] = pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall();
00460         if (vHomHet[iIndex] == (char)2) {vHomHet[iIndex] = (char)0;}
00461         if (pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeConfidence() > m_dLohCNNoCallThreshold) {vHomHet[iIndex] = (char)-1;}
00462         if (vHomHet[iIndex] == 1) {iHetCount++;}
00463         if (vHomHet[iIndex] >= 0)
00464         {
00465             iCallCount++;
00466             dMaximumGenotypeConfidence = Max((float)dMaximumGenotypeConfidence, pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeConfidence());
00467         }
00468         else
00469         {
00470             if (pobjProbeSet->processAsSNP()) {iNoCallCount++;}
00471         }
00472     }
00473     double dErrorRate = m_dLohCNErrorRate;
00474     if (((dMaximumGenotypeConfidence * 1.1) >= m_dLohCNNoCallThreshold) && (m_dLohCNNoCallThreshold == 0.05))
00475     {
00476         dErrorRate = ((double)iNoCallCount / (double)iSnpCount);
00477         dErrorRate = (0.002926 + 6.607106 * dErrorRate);
00478         dErrorRate = ceil(dErrorRate * 100) / 100.0;
00479         if (dErrorRate < m_dLohCNErrorRate) {dErrorRate = m_dLohCNErrorRate;}
00480     }
00481     double dHetRate = ((double)iHetCount / (double) iCallCount);
00482     if (dHetRate > 0.5) {dHetRate = 0.5;}
00483     if (dHetRate < 0.2) {dHetRate = 0.2;}
00484     int iIterations = 1;
00485     int iStart = 20;
00486     int n = 0;
00487     while (iIterations < 3)
00488     {
00489         iHetCutoff = AffxStatistics::binoinv((1 - m_dLohCNAlpha), iStart, dErrorRate);
00490         double a = AffxStatistics::norminv(m_dLohCNBeta);
00491         double sqrtn = (-a * 0.5 * sqrt(1 - dHetRate) / sqrt(dHetRate) + sqrt(a * a * (1 - dHetRate) / (4 * dHetRate) + iHetCutoff / dHetRate));
00492         n = (int)ceil(sqrtn * sqrtn);
00493         if (n == iStart) {break;}
00494         else {iStart = n;}
00495         iIterations++;
00496     }
00497     iMarkerCount = Max(n, m_iLohCNMinimumMarkerCount);
00498     if ((iMarkerCount % 2) == 0) {iMarkerCount++;}
00499     if (iMarkerCount < 3)
00500     {
00501         throw(Except("MarkerCount must be >= 3.")); return false;
00502     }
00503 
00504 
00505 
00506     // The hetRate is used in the CNAnalysisMethodSegment method to assign a confidence to the loh determination.  In order
00507     // that this value is accessible there we pass it to the CNExperiment object. Note that the het frequency is also 
00508     // computed and stored in a postprocessing function in the CNCytoEngine.  The two computations are the same.
00509     // We also need the dErrorRate when calculating confidences.  This value is also passed to the experiment object and then accessed
00510     // when segmenting.
00511     getExperiment()->setHetFrequency(dHetRate);
00512     getExperiment()->setPError(dErrorRate);
00513 
00514     return true;
00515 }
00516 
00517 /**
00518  * @brief Find the runs off LOH
00519  * @param std::vector<char>& - The genotype calls
00520  * @param std::vector<int>& - The chromosome positions
00521  * @param int - The marker count cutoff
00522  * @param int - The het call cutoff
00523  * @param int - The minimum genomic span for a run of LOH
00524  * @param std::vector<char>& - The resulting LOH calls (1 = LOH, 0 = !LOH)
00525  */
00526 bool CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::lohFind(      std::vector<char>& vGenotypeCalls, 
00527                                                 std::vector<int>& vPositions, 
00528                                                 int iMarkerCount, 
00529                                                 int iHetCutoff, 
00530                                                 int iMinGenomicSpan, 
00531                                                 std::vector<char>& vLoh)
00532 {
00533     int iWindowCenter = (int)floor(iMarkerCount / 2.0);
00534     if ((iWindowCenter * 2) != iMarkerCount - 1) {throw(Except("Window size must be odd.")); return false;}
00535     int iCurrentState = 0;
00536     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vLoh.size()); iIndex++)
00537     {
00538         vLoh[iIndex] = 0;
00539     }
00540     int iStateLoh = 1;
00541     int iStateNonLoh = 0;
00542     std::vector<int> vHetCount(vGenotypeCalls.size());
00543     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vGenotypeCalls.size()); iIndex++)
00544     {
00545         vHetCount[iIndex] = 0;
00546         if ((vGenotypeCalls[iIndex] != 0) && (vGenotypeCalls[iIndex] != 1))
00547         {
00548             throw(Except("LOH Failed")); return false;
00549         }
00550     }
00551     int iCurrentCallIndex = iWindowCenter;
00552     int iWindowOffset = iWindowCenter - iHetCutoff - 1;
00553     if (iWindowOffset < 1) {throw(Except("LOH Failed")); return false;}
00554     int iLastCallIndex = (int)vGenotypeCalls.size() - iWindowCenter - 1;
00555     int iCount = 0;
00556     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iMarkerCount); iIndex++)
00557     {
00558         if (vGenotypeCalls[iIndex] == 1) {iCount++;}
00559     }
00560     vHetCount[iCurrentCallIndex] = iCount;
00561 
00562     while (iCurrentCallIndex < iLastCallIndex)
00563     {
00564         int iPrevCallIndex = iCurrentCallIndex;
00565         if (vHetCount[iPrevCallIndex] >= iHetCutoff)
00566         {
00567             if (iCurrentState == 1)
00568             {
00569                 // in a LOH region transitioning back to non-LOH
00570                 // Change back to non-LOH state
00571                 // really now need to fill in from
00572                 // iPrevCallIndex-1:iPrevCallIndex+iWindowOffset -1 as also LOH
00573                 iCurrentState = 0;
00574                 int iMinCallIndex = Max(0, iPrevCallIndex - 1);
00575                 int iMaxCallIndex = iPrevCallIndex - 1;
00576                 int iHetsSeen = 0;
00577                 // starting from the window center go out as far as the
00578                 // second het or the end of the window which ever occurs first
00579                 // Take special care to stop at the last hom
00580                 while ((iHetsSeen < 2) && (iMaxCallIndex < iPrevCallIndex + iWindowOffset - 1) && (iMaxCallIndex < iLastCallIndex))
00581                 {
00582                     iMaxCallIndex = Min(iMaxCallIndex + 1, iPrevCallIndex + iWindowOffset - 1);
00583                     if (vGenotypeCalls[iMaxCallIndex] == 1)
00584                     {
00585                         iHetsSeen++;
00586                         if (iHetsSeen == 2)
00587                         {
00588                             iMaxCallIndex--;
00589                             if (vGenotypeCalls[iMaxCallIndex] == 1)
00590                             {
00591                                 iMaxCallIndex--;
00592                             }
00593                         }
00594                     }
00595                 }
00596                 for (int iIndex = iMinCallIndex; (iIndex <= iMaxCallIndex); iIndex++)
00597                 {
00598                     vLoh[iIndex] = iStateLoh;
00599                 }
00600                 if (iLastCallIndex >= (iPrevCallIndex + iWindowOffset))
00601                 {
00602                     for (int iIndex = (iPrevCallIndex + 1); (iIndex <= (iPrevCallIndex + iWindowOffset)); iIndex++)
00603                     {
00604                         vHetCount[iIndex] = vHetCount[iIndex - 1] - vGenotypeCalls[iIndex - 1 - iWindowCenter] + vGenotypeCalls[iIndex + iWindowCenter];
00605                     }
00606                 }
00607             }
00608             else
00609             {
00610                 // in a non-LOH region and not transitioning, move to the next marker
00611                 iCurrentCallIndex++;
00612                 vHetCount[iCurrentCallIndex] = vHetCount[iPrevCallIndex] - vGenotypeCalls[iPrevCallIndex - iWindowCenter] + vGenotypeCalls[iCurrentCallIndex + iWindowCenter];
00613             }
00614         }
00615         else
00616         {
00617             if (iCurrentState == 0)
00618             {
00619                 // if we are transitioning to the LOH state then we should
00620                 // mark back to the start of the Window as LOH
00621                 iCurrentState = 1;
00622                 int iMinCallIndex = iPrevCallIndex;
00623                 int iHetsSeen = 0;
00624                 // starting from the window center go out as far as the
00625                 // second het or the end of the window which ever occurs first
00626                 // Take special care to stop at the last hom
00627                 while ((iHetsSeen < 2) && (iMinCallIndex > (iPrevCallIndex - iWindowOffset)) && (iMinCallIndex > 0))
00628                 {
00629                     iMinCallIndex = Max(iMinCallIndex - 1, 0);
00630                     if (vGenotypeCalls[iMinCallIndex] == 1)
00631                     {
00632                         iHetsSeen++;
00633                         if (iHetsSeen == 2)
00634                         {
00635                             iMinCallIndex++;
00636                             if (vGenotypeCalls[iMinCallIndex] == 1)
00637                             {
00638                                 iMinCallIndex++;
00639                             }
00640                         }
00641                     }
00642                 }
00643                 for (int iIndex = iMinCallIndex; (iIndex <= iCurrentCallIndex); iIndex++)
00644                 {
00645                     vLoh[iIndex] = iStateLoh; // we know definitively that these are LOH
00646                 }
00647                 // we could also make a guess about those that are
00648                 // following but instead we will move forward
00649                 // conservatively
00650             }
00651             vLoh[iCurrentCallIndex] = iStateLoh;
00652             iCurrentCallIndex++;
00653             vHetCount[iCurrentCallIndex] = vHetCount[iPrevCallIndex] - vGenotypeCalls[iPrevCallIndex - iWindowCenter] + vGenotypeCalls[iCurrentCallIndex + iWindowCenter];
00654         }
00655     }
00656     // deal with markers that don't have a full window around them
00657     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iWindowCenter); iIndex++)
00658     {
00659         vLoh[iIndex] = vLoh[iWindowCenter + 1];
00660     }
00661     for (int iIndex = iCurrentCallIndex; (iIndex < (int)vLoh.size()); iIndex++)
00662     {
00663         vLoh[iIndex] = vLoh[iCurrentCallIndex-1];
00664     }
00665 
00666     // We move up the segment until iBeginIndex points to the first marker having iStateLoh.
00667     int iBeginIndex =0;
00668     while(iBeginIndex < vLoh.size() && vLoh[iBeginIndex] != iStateLoh )
00669     {
00670         iBeginIndex++;
00671     } 
00672     if(iBeginIndex == vLoh.size())
00673     {
00674         return true;
00675     }
00676 
00677 
00678     int iSegmentStartIndex=iBeginIndex;
00679     int iStartPosition=vPositions[iBeginIndex];
00680     int iPreviousState = vLoh[iBeginIndex];
00681     int iPreviousPosition=vPositions[iBeginIndex];
00682 
00683     for(int iIndex=iBeginIndex+1; iIndex < vLoh.size(); iIndex++)
00684     {
00685     
00686         int iPresentPosition = vPositions[iIndex];
00687         int iPresentState = vLoh[iIndex];
00688 
00689         // Case 1:  We have hit the end of the segment.   
00690         if(iIndex == vPositions.size()-1) 
00691         {
00692             // SubCase a: In this case the state of the final marker is the same as the state of the penultimate marker
00693             // and this state is LOH but the length of the region is small.
00694             if(     iPresentState == iPreviousState  && 
00695                     iPresentState == iStateLoh          && 
00696                     iPresentPosition-iStartPosition < iMinGenomicSpan) 
00697             {
00698                 for(int iNewIndex = iSegmentStartIndex; iNewIndex < vPositions.size(); iNewIndex++)
00699                 {
00700                     vLoh[iNewIndex] = iStateNonLoh;
00701                 }
00702             }
00703             // SubCase b: In this case the state of the final marker is non-loh, but the penultimate is LOH.
00704             // Also the region of LOH is small we set it to non-loh
00705             if(     iPreviousState == iStateLoh          && 
00706                     iPresentState == iStateNonLoh          && 
00707                     iPreviousPosition-iStartPosition < iMinGenomicSpan) 
00708             {
00709                 for(int iNewIndex = iSegmentStartIndex; iNewIndex < vPositions.size(); iNewIndex++)
00710                 {
00711                     vLoh[iNewIndex] = iStateNonLoh;
00712                 }
00713             }
00714             // SubCase c:  In this case the final marker is LOH and penultimate is non-Loh. 
00715             // We set the final marker to non-LOH.
00716             if(     iPreviousState == iStateNonLoh          && 
00717                     iPresentState == iStateLoh) 
00718             {
00719                 vLoh[iPresentPosition] = iStateNonLoh;
00720             }        
00721             break;
00722         }
00723 
00724         if(     iPresentState != iPreviousState &&
00725                 iPresentState == iStateNonLoh      &&
00726                 iPreviousPosition-iStartPosition >  iMinGenomicSpan)
00727         { 
00728             int i=0;
00729             i++;
00730         } 
00731 
00732         // Case 2:  We have changed state at the end of an LOH region into a non-LOH region 
00733         if(     iPresentState != iPreviousState &&
00734                 iPresentState == iStateNonLoh      &&
00735                 iPreviousPosition-iStartPosition <  iMinGenomicSpan)
00736         { 
00737             for(int iNewIndex = iSegmentStartIndex; iNewIndex < iIndex; iNewIndex++)
00738             {
00739                 vLoh[iNewIndex] = iStateNonLoh;
00740             }
00741         } 
00742        
00743         // Case 3:  We have changed state at the end of a non-Loh region into an LOH region. 
00744         // So we reset the iStartPosition and iSegmentStartIndex.
00745         if(     iPresentState != iPreviousState &&
00746                 iPresentState == iStateLoh)
00747         {
00748             iStartPosition = iPresentPosition;
00749             iSegmentStartIndex = iIndex; 
00750         } 
00751 
00752         iPreviousPosition = iPresentPosition;
00753         iPreviousState = iPresentState;
00754     }
00755 
00756     return true;
00757 }
00758 
00759 void CNAnalysisMethodLOHCytoScan::determineLocalProbeSets()
00760 {
00761     if (m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined) {return;}
00762     int iNumberOfProbeSets = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount();
00763     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < iNumberOfProbeSets); iIndex++)
00764     {
00765         if (CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAsSNP() )
00766         {
00767              getProbeSets()->add( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex));
00768         }
00769     }
00770     m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined = true;
00771 }
